directions.step:
PAN SIZE: 18 BY 26-INCH SHEET PAN TEMPERATURE: 375 F. OVEN
1. ARRANGE 4 1/2 QTS APPLES IN EACH GREASED PAN.
2. SPRINKLE LEMON JUICE AND LEMON RIND OVER APPLES.
3. COMBINE SUGAR, STARCH, CINNAMON, AND SALT; SPRINKLE 3 1/2 CUPS MIXTURE OVER APPLES IN EACH PAN. STIR LIGHTLY.
4. COMBINE BROWN SUGAR, FLOUR, BAKING POWDER; BAKING SODA, SALT AND BUTTER OR MARGARINE. BLEND TO FORM A CRUMBLY MIXTURE. SPRINKLE ABOUT 2 1/2 QT MIXTURE EVENLY OVER APPLES IN EACH PAN.
5. BAKE 40 MINUTES OR UNTIL TOP LIGHTLY BROWNED.
6. CUT 6 X 9. SERVE WITH SERVING SPOON OR SPATULA.
NOTE: 1. IN STEP 2, 12 OZ LEMONS A.P. (3 LEMONS) WILL YIELD 1/2 CUP JUICE.
NOTE: 2. IN STEP 3, 4 OZ (7/8 CUP) CORNSTARCH MAY BE USED FOR PREGELATINIZED STARCH.
NOTE: 3. IN STEP 5, IF CONVECTION OVEN IS USED, BAKE AT 350 DEGREES F. 30 MINUTES OR UNTIL BUBBLING AND LIGHTLY BROWNED ON LOW FAN, OPEN VENT.
Recipe Number: J00100
SERVING SIZE: 1 SQUARE
